items.subTitle: Overview
items.contents: The Department of Physics was established in the year 2003. The Department is facilitated with different Research thrust areas such as Batteries, Crystal Growth, DSSC, Magnetic Materials, Nano Materials, Solar Energy, Supercapacitor, Water Splitting, Photocatalysis, Functional Energy Materials and Thin Film Physics which provide a wide range of opportunities to engage in world-class physics and multi-disciplinary research. The contribution of motivated and well qualified teaching faculty generated a number of successful students, who are now working in various public and private sectors. The department consistently produces students who are qualified in admission entrance of reputed institutions all over the country.Students are continuously clearing the national level examinations such as CSIR-NET, GATE, etc with good All India Ranking (AIR) and are pursuing higher education in reputed universities, and research institutes within the country and abroad.For Research, two Center of Excellence viz., Center for Energy and Environment and Center for Computational Physics which are equipped with high-end equipments of Fourier Transform Infrared Spectrometer (FTIR), UV-Visible Spectrophotometer, Photoluminescence spectrometer, Photocatalytic activity, Electrochemical Work Station, LCR meter, TGA, DSC and Vacuum Furnace. These facilities provide a practical approach to learning that allows students to explore concepts and theories in a tangible way which can help to cultivate a lifelong interest in science and learning.

items.subTitle: Vision
content: Towards a Global Knowledge Hub, striving continuously in pursuit of excellence in Education, Research, Entrepreneurship and Technological services to the society.

items.subTitle: Mission
content: Bring the vital and exciting element of exploration and discovery to the study of natural sciences at the undergraduate and postgraduate level.
Promote interdisciplinary research across departments and disciplines by setting up centres of excellence in research and teaching.
Create vibrant partnerships with industry to solve problems that are relevant to mankind and a sustainable future

content.caption: Professor and Head
content.content: I am pleased to welcome you to the Department of Physics under the Faculty of Arts, Science, Commerce and Management. Our department was established in 2003, along with the inception of our University and our vision is to ignite and nurture enthusiasm, interests, and passion in young minds for pure and applied physics, and build a foundation for excellence in fundamental and applied research. As the Head of the Department, I am proud to be part of a team of dedicated and talented individuals who are not only committed to excellence in teaching but also highly committed to research which is evident from their publications in peer-reviewed journals, patents, and research grants sponsored by DST-SERB CRG and TARE. The Department offers PG and Doctoral programmes with curricula that conforms to the requirement of Academia and R & D Organizations along with exposure to Industrial atmosphere / research institutes through internships and publishable quality dissertation work in final semester which is the added advantage to our students to further excel in the research field.I invite you to explore our website to learn more about all that our department has to offer. You will find a wealth of information about our faculty, research programs, courses, posts, and upcoming events. Thank you for your interest in the Physics Department.

basic.title: Faculty
basic.description: The faculty of the Department of Physics comprises experienced academicians and researchers committed to excellence in teaching, experimentation, and research. They emphasize strong conceptual understanding, analytical skills, and practical applications, preparing students for careers in research, technology, and interdisciplinary sciences.
